record.id: field.name="apprdis" and file.name="ocmprofile" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: apprdis
record.file.name: ocmprofile

brief.brief: If selected (set to true), enables members of this profile to deny approval.
When this option is true, the operator can update the approval.status of the current ocmapprlog to denied.

detail.detail: This parameter also controls the Deny All option, which enables members of this profile to deny all records in an approval requirements list. It runs when Service Manager displays an approval log record. The operator must have approval authority for the current group or must have override authority.
